item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. No more needles Tracking blood sugar on your wrist (195 points | 67 comments)
2. Guten: A Tiny Newspaper Printer (102 points | 43 comments)
3. Nanoimprint Lithography Aims to Take on EUV (26 points | 1 comment)
4. Blur Busters Open Source Display Initiative – Refresh Cycle Shaders (35 points | 9 comments)
5. Combining 15s interval whole-sky-camera photos to form a 4y spanning keogram (420 points | 66 comments)
6. GPON FTTH networks (in)security (2016) (26 points | 4 comments)
7. Refurb Weekend: Atari Stacy (31 points | 1 comment)
8. Hacker gains access to the RP2350 OTP secret by glitching the RISC-V cores (96 points | 8 comments)
9. ELKS: Linux for 16-bit Intel Processors (149 points | 65 comments)
10. How to draw an outline in a video game (472 points | 53 comments)
11. Visually Compare Retry Algorithms (13 points | discuss)
12. Myst Markdown – Markdown for technical/scientific document (50 points | 7 comments)
13. University of Alabama Engineer Pioneers New Process for Recycling Plastics (2024) (104 points | 92 comments)
14. Hornet, RNA structure visualization method correlates sequence and 3D topology (11 points | 3 comments)
15. One Dog vs. the Windows 3.1 Graphics Stack (192 points | 71 comments)
16. The comb jelly can fuse with another (including nervous and digestive systems) (46 points | 8 comments)
17. It Matters Who Owns Your Copylefted Copyrights (2021) (91 points | 124 comments)
18. Labwc: Wlroots-based window-stacking compositor for Wayland, inspired by openbox (44 points | 9 comments)
19. PyPI Blog: Project Quarantine (68 points | 10 comments)
20. Wildcard: Customize HN using a spreadsheet view (5 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: WebGPU + TypeScript Slime Mold (57 points | 9 comments)
22. Hacking yourself a satellite – recovering BEESAT-1 [video] (148 points | 11 comments)
23. Phase behavior of Cacio and Pepe sauce (347 points | 173 comments)
24. No-hole surgery: no keyhole, yet surgeons can now still operate under your skin (67 points | 19 comments)
25. The DIY Multideck (123 points | 46 comments)
26. Show HN: I created a PoC for live descriptions of the surroundings for the blind (49 points | 11 comments)
27. A Return to Polymathy (2015) [pdf] (123 points | 59 comments)
28. Show HN: Pretty-print your chess games using Prettier (87 points | 8 comments)
29. Programming as Theory Building (1985) [pdf] (190 points | 38 comments)
30. Self driving 1993 Volvo with open pilot (590 points | 129 comments)
